project_abstract.cdata: The Higher and Technical Education Project will support the Government's education sector program for higher and polytechnic education, which aims to produce the human resources required to support a more competitive economy. The project will assist the Government's program by: (a) strengthening the University of Mauritius, and (b) rationalizing polytechnic education.
